featured.text: As the climate became drier and colder, they retreated to a narrow strip along the Pacific coast of Northern California.

definition.zh_def: 和平的；平靜的；太平洋的
definition.en_def: Calm and peaceful; relating to the Pacific Ocean.
definition.example: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.
